name: Rending Flames
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, Rending Flames gains "This attack deals double damage."
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, Rending Flames gains "This attack deals double damage."

rule.description: If Rending Flames deals double damage, it doubles all other sources of attack damage as well. This includes but is not limited to weapon attack and temporary attack bonus effects.

flavor: Maximum force at the most critical moment.
